long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Transform your new tab into a canvas of creativity with PaletteWiz! With just one click, generate a unique and beautiful colour palette each time you open a new tab. Say goodbye to dull and boring tabs, and hello to inspiration with this must-have extension. Perfect for artists, designers, and anyone who loves colour. Get it now for a vibrant and colourful browsing experience.

Copy these vibrant colours with just one click!!
